storyInfo: The situation appears to be resolving itself as the Pioneers reach an accord with Dorothy, who agrees to terminate her experiments. Ferdinand makes a bold play, sending his men to inject the Pioneer with Transmitter.

attributes.content: ...Sonny.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: We did this of our own volition.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: I don't get it, Doc Moore... who are you talking for here?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Message.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: I received a message, one that is different from that previous ones.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Hngh...
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Does your head hurt again, Joyce?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: There is nothing wrong with me physically, Dr. Silence.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Detecting unexpected data transmission. Processing.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Data?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Yes... Sonny, we all know...
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: This is... a gamble.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: The results are... unpredictable. But this was our choice.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Data transmission terminated. Analysis indicates that Sonny is the intended recipient.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Doc Moore, you're talking like one of our... no, one of the test subjects lying there.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Hypothesis cannot be confirmed.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: The source of the data is unknown. I simply sensed it.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Doc Silence, is she right? Doc Moore can hear my friends?!
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Joyce, was your use of the word 'sense' intentional?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Yes, Dr. Silence.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: The content of the dream has changed.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: What did you see?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Analysis failed.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Your eyes look different... are you feeling sad?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Detecting signal fluctuations in peripheral system.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: ...Della.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Dellareed? Are you thinking of her again? Does Device #9 have something to do with Director Franks's experiments?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Motive, emotion, not logical connections.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Dr. Silence, I sense that this was our own choice.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Your own choice?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Sonny, if I guarantee that I will do all that can be done to correct the wrongs, will you let Dorothy Franks go?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Listen, Doc Silence, we appreciate your help getting us here, and that you got us to the truth about the experiments.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: We can definitely believe you're on our side.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: But can you really be sure she won't start it all back up again?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: No, I can't.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: But if she does, I will handle her for you.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Whew... the experiments have been suspended, Dorothy is unharmed, and the test subjects are regaining consciousness.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: I still find all this hard to believe.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: There is no cause for alarm. Emotional fluctuations are normal.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: You woke up just in time, Joyce.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: I've never seen Olivia that angry... I thought she would just leave Dorothy to her own devices.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: But I still don't understand how you heard the voices of the test subjects.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Their consciousnesses were linked by Dorothy's 'Hub', but how did you get involved?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Didn't you say Device #9 had nothing to do with the 'Hub'?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Insufficient data available.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: But I heard the voice of Mr. Myers when I woke up from my dream.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: When you woke up...
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: The conflict in the corridor? Why would that wake you, when the battle before didn't?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: This is all so strange...
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Anyway, I guess all's well that ends well. Thanks to Olivia.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Dr. Silence has met expectations.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: She's changed so much, come to think of it.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: When I first met her, she was just one of many students you'd see on a college campus, shy, introverted, unremarkable.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: This description matches my memory.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: I could hardly recognize her when she was pressing Dorothy for answers, only to step in to protect her.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: It was like I saw... a shadow of someone else.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: That of Director Saria?
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: H-How did you know?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Don't tell Olivia I said that!
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Dr. Silence won't let this affect her friendship with you.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: I know.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: But as her friend, I don't want to remind her of her unpleasant past.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Understood.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Let's go. I should finish my job too.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Communications have yet to be restored... not good. The boss...
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: And my sister... how many messages have I been getting?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Please come with me, Director Franks. It's time to leave.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: One moment, please.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: With the experiments halted, they will wipe this lab off the map.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: There's something I have to take with me.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: It's... a photo?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: A photo of a group of Pioneers...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Is this girl... you?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I meant every word I said to Sonny.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: My mother, my whole family... they were all Pioneers.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: From a young age I heard them talk about their dreams and saw their struggles with my own eyes.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: They gave me a chance to chase my own dreams.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: But most Pioneers will never know the luck that came to me.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: What happened to your family?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Most of them have left me.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: When I was invited to attend Ironforge Polytechnic's summer camp for 'talented students'...
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: A Catastrophe destroyed my mother's camp.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: She never heard about my miraculous acceptance, or my scholarship.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: I'm sorry...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Was it really the right choice to stop these experiments?
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Those Pioneers, those whose lives hang by a thread, they live each day not knowing if they'll see the next.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: I could have helped them...
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: They didn't have to be swallowed up by the sand in despair, like my family was.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Why do you ask this, Silence?
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: Without our experiments, the child would not have lasted more than a few days after leaving Haydn 1.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: We saved her life. She wants for nothing, and will contribute to scientific advancement.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: How lucky is she, compared to all those children who die of Oripathy in the barrenlands?
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: I trusted you, put you in charge of her. Yet you make such petty accusations towards me, towards science itself?
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: I don't know.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: This is not a question for me to answer.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Joyce reminded me...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I should not judge things by my own standards, even if I can never accept what you did.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Did we not choose to be tormented by uncertainty and self-doubt?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: As researchers, it's our duty to seek the answer ourselves.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Is everything ready?
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Our team has entered the site and is approaching the lab area.
attributes.name: Rhine Defense Member

attributes.content: Good. Get ready.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Colonel, I know there have been delays, but if you give me a little more time...
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: You never told me there were other people at the site, Clooney.
attributes.name: Colonel's Voice

attributes.content: Do you mean the pharmaceutical company?
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: There's nothing to worry about. They're partnered with Rhine Lab. I will...
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: I don't need your promises.
attributes.name: Colonel's Voice

attributes.content: All I need here is results.
attributes.name: Colonel's Voice

attributes.content: I apologize. This is just a small hiccup...
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: If you can't deliver results, then you have to at least stop making trouble for me.
attributes.name: Colonel's Voice

attributes.content: You'd do well to remember that.
attributes.name: Colonel's Voice

attributes.content: Can we proceed, Director Clooney?
attributes.name: Rhine Defense Member

attributes.content: We don't have a choice.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Understood.
attributes.name: Rhine Defense Member

attributes.content: One more thing.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Put me on spec com.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Huh... communications have been restored?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Elena.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Director?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: I'm so glad it's you. I've been trying to reach you... did you get my message? I put everything that happened here in my report.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Something's wrong with Dorothy... Director Franks's experiments. But Silence and I have things under control.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: We've settled things with the Pioneers. They're leaving the labs as we speak.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: I know.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: You... you do? Oh wow...
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: You did your job. The cleanup detail is on the way in.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Defense? They're finally here?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Whew, that's a relief. I was worried about the Transmitter we've been storing here.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: They know what to do. You can leave now.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: I should stay and help. Next to Dorothy, I'm the most familiar with these experiments.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: I'm at the observation station, Elena. Two directors are more than enough to handle the situation, don't you agree?
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Er, that's not what I meant...
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Then listen to me and leave the site immediately.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: May I ask why?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: No, you may not waste my time with meaningless questions. I want you in the control room, now.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Yes... sir.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Is there a problem, Researcher Urbica?
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: The director... Ferdinand wants me to leave immediately.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Leave?
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Go and let Olivia know that the Defense Section is coming.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: What about you? Are you leaving?
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: I... something's not right with the director. If... if he didn't know how far Dorothy went, why is he completely unconcerned about what happened to the experiments?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Director Clooney, Miss Urbica is not leaving the labs.
attributes.name: Rhine Defense Member

attributes.content: Should we adjust the plan?
attributes.name: Rhine Defense Member

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Proceed.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Is everybody out?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Yes, sir.
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: Next.
attributes.name: Rhine Defense Member

attributes.content: What are they doing?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: They say it's a 'precautionary measure'. Probably a sedative or something.
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: I guess we made a little too much noise, huh?
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: Don't forget what I said. If anyone asks, I was the one behind everything.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Don't worry, no one's letting you take all the credit.
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Next.
attributes.name: Rhine Defense Member

attributes.content: Sonny Romano.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Wasn't asking for your name.
attributes.name: Rhine Defense Member

attributes.content: Tell your leader that I take sole responsibility for the kidnapping.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Right hand.
attributes.name: Rhine Defense Member

attributes.content: Are you gonna get to it after the injection?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: What the...? Doc Urbica? Why'd you push me?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Don't take the shot!
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: You're interfering with our work, researcher.
attributes.name: Rhine Defense Member

attributes.content: I developed that stuff in that syringe.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Need me to explain what it's for?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Huh? Aren't they with you and Doc Silence?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Why do you always doubt the people you should trust, when you're so eager to trust people you should doubt?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Take that band off, quick!
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: The treatment wristband?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: I remembered why Joyce woke up when I saw the syringes in their hands!
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: It's this—the treatment bands!
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: The ones you got have been modified. There's a sensor on them similar to the equipment in Dorothy's lab. If it comes into contact with Transmitter...
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: I need to report to the director. Someone is behind all this, using... using...
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Dammit, communications are down again?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: What's the matter?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: I... I get it now.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: All this time...
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Doc Urbica, are you okay? Are you crying?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Crying? No, I just...
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: It's not important.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: This isn't over, Sonny. Dorothy was never your enemy!
attributes.name: Elena
